description: This source file is a React component for the homepage of a note-organizing application. It manages the state and interactions for viewing, creating, and editing notes, including event handling for external triggers and rendering UI elements such as note cards and a note editor.

methods.name: Home
methods.description: Main React component that renders the notes interface, manages state for editing notes, and handles external events to open the editor.

methods.name: openNew
methods.description: Creates a new empty note and opens the editor for editing it.

methods.name: onEdit
methods.description: Sets the editor to edit the note with the specified ID.
